body_html:
@QuantScientist Quoted solution from here:

One suggested solution on Anaconda3 in windows 10:

  1. Find pip folder under "../Anaconda3/Lib/site-packages/", delete it manually.
  2. then in Anacoda prompt do : conda uninstall pip
  3. then install pip using your familiar way. E.g: conda install -c anaconda pip

then in Anacoda prompt do : conda uninstall pip
then install pip using your familiar way. E.g: conda install -c anaconda pip
body:
@QuantScientist Quoted solution from [here](https://github.com/pypa/pip/issues/4330):
> One suggested solution on Anaconda3 in windows 10:
> 1. Find pip folder under "../Anaconda3/Lib/site-packages/", delete it manually.
> 2. then in Anacoda prompt do : conda uninstall pip
> 3. then install pip using your familiar way. E.g: conda install -c anaconda pip
